questions.skill: Interpret scatterplots and lines of best fit
questions.question: A scatterplot shows the relationship between hours studied (x) and test scores (y). The line of best fit is y = 5x + 60. According to this model, what is the predicted test score for a student who studies for 6 hours?
questions.explanation: Substitute x = 6 into the equation: y = 5(6) + 60 = 30 + 60 = 90. The model predicts a test score of 90 for 6 hours of studying.
